title: Web Speech API output should use Cortana's voice
body: For Consistency, the Web Speech API for voice output to read page content should be Cortana

comments.body: I have a Voice-Authorization code on my card for identify theft so u need to put this in be for u use it 071149

I think we users should have a chose of the voice. Cortana's voice is monotone and I personally like British speaking man or woman. Furthermore how about our own voice or other we know. More comfort in directions and taking to, when the voice is a familiar person.
Thanks, Erin Young
